content: I create a dataset in the root collection, but when I go to the root collection I don't see the newly created dataset at all. What I am doing wrong?
Is the dataset published? If the dataset is not published, then unless you are logged in (and you are the dataset creator), you will not see it.

Sherry Lake said:

Is the dataset published? If the dataset is not published, then unless you are logged in (and you are the dataset creator), you will not see it.

I logged in and created the dataset and immediately went to the My Data page to see it but don't see it at all.
@Mohsen Jafari what if you edit the metadata of the dataset and click save? Then do you see it?
